# Cloud Architecture Center - What's next
Last reviewed 2023-11-13 UTC
This page provides links to reliability-focused documentation that supplements the architectural guidance in the [Google Cloud infrastructure reliability guide](/architecture/infra-reliability-guide) .
- [Design scalable and resilient applications](/architecture/scalable-and-resilient-apps) .Patterns and best practices for building cloud applications that are resilient and scalable.
- [Mitigate ransomware attacks](/architecture/bps-for-mitigating-ransomware-attacks) .Best practices to help you identify, prevent, detect, and respond to ransomware attacks.
- [Plan for disaster recovery (DR)](/architecture/dr-scenarios-planning-guide) .A series of documents that focus on designing for DR in the cloud.
- [Review the strategies for deploying and testing applications in Google Cloud](/architecture/application-deployment-and-testing-strategies) .Overview of commonly used application deployment and testing patterns, the benefits they offer, and implementation considerations.
- [Create reliable operational processes and tools](/architecture/framework/reliability/create-operational-processes-tools) .Operational principles to run workloads in the cloud reliably, including guidance about deploying updates to production and testing for failures.
- [Learn about deployment archetypes for cloud applications](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3498336) An article in ACM Computing Surveys that explores six cloud-based deployment archetypes and their tradeoffs between high availability, latency, and cost
